p: Tocilizumab has no inhibitory effects on cytochromes. However, tocilizumab reverses IL-6 induced suppression of cytochromes and the elevation of IL-6 during inflammation has been shown to inhibit CYP3A4, CYP2C19, CYP2C9, and CYP1A2 expression, resulting in higher exposure of substrate drugs [ 64].
